医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新项目将传统方法与元病毒组学相结合，研究野生啮齿动物中的病毒爆发疾病何时、何地、为何从动物传染给人类？一个新项目将监测季节变化、土地利用和人类行为如何影响野生啮齿动物种群中的病毒爆发，以确定极有可能传播给人类的热点地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-project-combines-traditional-methods-with-metaviromics-to-study-viral-outbreaks-in-wild-rodents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-project-combines-traditional-methods-with-metaviromics-to-study-viral-outbreaks-in-wild-rodents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab724fa6-4bdc-4ac6-ada5-556731da27f0 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 21:21:26 -0400 New project combines traditional methods with metaviromics to study viral outbreaks in wild rodents
新型可穿戴心电图设备有助于预防心脏病与市场上类似的心脏监测设备相比，新型紧凑、轻便、无凝胶且防水的心电图 (ECG) 传感器提供更高的舒适度和更少的皮肤刺激。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-wearable-ECG-device-could-help-prevent-heart-attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-wearable-ECG-device-could-help-prevent-heart-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=562dd40f-301f-4f4c-91e7-f94124e26f92 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 21:16:54 -0400 New wearable ECG device could help prevent heart attacks
低收入老年人住房加医疗服务模式的财务挑战《老龄化研究》杂志上发表的一项开创性研究揭示了低收入老年人住房加医疗服务模式面临的财务挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Financial-challenges-of-housing-with-health-services-models-for-low-venue-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Financial-challenges-of-housing-with-health-services-models-for-low-venue-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b211bb78-a218-45d1-8f0a-86b557ce3dce Tue, 31 Oct 2023 21:09:39 -0400 Financial challenges of housing-with-health-services models for low-income older adults
对于 2 型糖尿病患者来说，限时饮食的减肥效果优于卡路里计算在一项为期六个月的随机临床试验中，研究人员发现，对于 2 型糖尿病成人来说，限时饮食 (TRE) 比每日热量限制更能有效减轻体重，并且在调节血糖水平方面同样有效。研究表明，TRE 可能是一种更简单、更容易坚持的饮食策略来控制病情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Time-restricted-eating-outperforms-calorie-counting-in-weight-loss-for-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Time-restricted-eating-outperforms-calorie-counting-in-weight-loss-for-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e788c9f7-0e2b-48b0-8b3e-99f4522c4069 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 21:00:00 -0400 Time-restricted eating outperforms calorie counting in weight loss for type 2 diabetes patients
一个基因如何动摇我们对男性不育症的理解该研究利用转基因小鼠研究了 ACTL7B 基因在精子形成中的作用，发现该基因的缺陷会导致精子发生失败和精子结构异常。鉴于该基因在人类中的相似性，研究结果表明 ACTL7B 可以作为男性不育症的潜在生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/How-one-gene-shakes-up-our-understanding-of-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/How-one-gene-shakes-up-our-understanding-of-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d8731ea-8efd-4b7a-b37b-e64cf7f19573 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 20:51:00 -0400 How one gene shakes up our understanding of male infertility
加速阿尔茨海默病研究：Progerin 增强细胞模型以加快药物筛选速度研究表明，将早老素（一种与加速衰老相关的蛋白质）引入阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 细胞模型中可以加速 AD 相关特征的发展。这种创新方法为研究 AD 机制提供了一种更有效的方法，有可能加速新疗法的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Speeding-up-Alzheimers-research-Progerin-turbocharges-cellular-models-for-quicker-drug-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Speeding-up-Alzheimers-research-Progerin-turbocharges-cellular-models-for-quicker-drug-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52c237d8-98c7-434e-85ce-40aac416ee00 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 20:02:00 -0400 Speeding up Alzheimer's research: Progerin turbocharges cellular models for quicker drug screening
下一代测序如何改变抗体药物的发现新研究概述了下一代测序 (NGS) 和机器学习方法如何彻底改变抗体发现，特别是针对 SARS-CoV-2 的抗体。研究表明，NGS 提供了更大的表位和互补位多样性，从而能够更有效地识别治疗性抗体并确定其优先顺序。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/How-next-gen-sequencing-is-changing-antibody-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/How-next-gen-sequencing-is-changing-antibody-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aee411b4-672c-4149-a53f-0c32d4898be2 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 19:48:00 -0400 How next-gen sequencing is changing antibody drug discovery
增强记忆力：芥末被发现可以增强老年人的脑力一项针对 60 岁以上成年人的为期 12 周的研究发现，含有 6-MSITC 的芥末补充剂可显着改善情景记忆和工作记忆。虽然其他认知领域没有表现出任何改善，但研究结果表明，芥末的抗炎和抗氧化特性可能为对抗与年龄相关的记忆衰退提供新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Spicing-up-memory-Wasabi-found-to-boost-brainpower-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Spicing-up-memory-Wasabi-found-to-boost-brainpower-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=901c385e-f9d9-4540-83d2-e2e2b2a56b67 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 19:29:00 -0400 Spicing up memory: Wasabi found to boost brainpower in seniors
新分析揭穿了神话：NFL 球员的寿命并不长，尤其是前锋这项研究通过考察教育、健康和社会经济地位等因素，挑战了美国橄榄球运动员寿命更长的观点。研究发现，与其他位置的球员和具有类似背景的男性相比，边裁的预期寿命较短。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-analysis-debunks-myth-NFL-players-dont-live-longer-特别是-linemen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-analysis-debunks-myth-NFL-players-dont-live-longer-特别是-linemen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6841da69-5f62-444a-b833-c424d476b8c9 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 18:59:00 -0400 New analysis debunks myth: NFL players don't live longer, especially linemen
人工智能可能有助于识别潜在的淋病疫苗蛋白淋病是一种性传播细菌感染，每年影响全球超过 8000 万人，它已对几乎所有已知的抗生素产生耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/AI-may-help-identify-潜在-淋病-疫苗-蛋白质.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/AI-may-help-identify-潜在-淋病-疫苗-蛋白质.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd95a6e7-e612-4f72-96be-d881ef7e6306 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 15:36:07 -0400 AI may help identify potential gonorrhea vaccine proteins
